{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=BEFW11S4 |revision=v4 (r1, Taiwan) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/22/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PKW-BEFW11S4V4 |ic_id=3839A-W115S4V4 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88W8500 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800BTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=4 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM636165TS-7 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8500 |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8000 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=RP-TNC |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=linksys |default_ssid_regex=^linksys$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:06:25 |oui_eth=00:06:25 }} ''Wireless-B Broadband Router''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=BEFW11S4}} [http://media.transaction-one.com/media/uploads/NET/PDF/123.pdf Device is on this list] {{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_BEFW11S4_v4_(r1,_Taiwan)}} There is also an entry under the Q87 grantee code for this device (FCC ID: Q87-BEFW11S4). There are multiple revisions of this device. :The original revision (Made in Taiwan) specifies the voltage as 5V 2A (in the pictures below). :The second revision (Made in China) specifies the voltage as 12V 1A. ::[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=26686&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=15 High-res images of this model on the DD-WRT forums] Serial numbers for this revision ''may'' start with '''C2760''' (and not followed by a C or D). "F500-214D0700 REV:" is silkscreened on the board. Additional FCC IDs of Q87-HGA7T-3 (Linksys HGA7T, high gain antennas) and Q87-HGA5T-3 (Linksys HGA5T, high gain antennas) {{WiFiCert|W000909|04/18/2003}} ==Images== ====from [[User:M86|m86]]==== File:Linksys BEFW11S4 v4 board top.jpg|board top File:Linksys BEFW11S4 v4 board bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]]
